name: @enactprotocol/mcp-server
description: MCP server for the Enact Protocol - enables AI tools integration via Model Context Protocol

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node && mkdir -p ./dist/web && cp -r ../shared/src/web/static ./dist/web/ && sed -i.bak '1{/^#!/d;}' ./dist/index.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - ./dist/index.js > temp && mv temp ./dist/index.js && chmod +x ./dist/index.js

author: EnactProtocol
